[DQR.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -585,000 reported in the network role http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdursultatglobalcomposantesdesautreslmentsdursultatglobalprsentesnettesdimptStatement, http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdursultatglobalrsultatnetchargesparfonctionStatement, http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdesfluxdetrsoreriemthodeindirecteStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 585,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.interparfums.fr/role/tatdesvariationsdescapitauxpropresStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500SARWF33OPQED48/2021-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/itp-2021-12-31AR.zip/itp-2021-12-31AR/reports/itp-2021-12-31AR.xhtml 1446
